availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel J. Hughes (Union Co, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James T. Hughes and Lucy Hughes. Married to Eliza Eakins Hughes in Henderson County, Kentucky, on September 22, 1842. Father of James A. Hughes, Sarah A. Hughes. Farmer in Union County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 1, p. 446A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 323.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 337B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #000576460.
